name: Oracle Database 12c Enterprise Edition on a single virtual machine - IBM
description: This template deploys Oracle Enterprise Database V12c with a raw database on a Linux virtual machine.

metadata.displayName: Oracle Database 12c Enterprise Edition on a single virtual machine
metadata.longDescription: This template deploys Oracle Enterprise Database V12c with a raw database on a Linux virtual machine.

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
2. Detailed system requirements for Oracle Database 12c - https://docs.oracle.com/en/database
